<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Migrate skills from tables which extend task which have a property name like com.snc.skills_management.{table_name}_migrate_skills with value set to true, to task_m2m_skill table. 
		Once the migration for a particular table is done, its respective system property will be set to false.
		If you try to run the migration script for a particular table more than once, you will get the unique key violation error for records that already exist.
	</description>
        <name>Migrate Skills to Task Skill M2M</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var migratedTables = [];
var migratedTablesString = gs.getProperty('com.snc.skills_management.task_skill_migrated_tables');
if(JSUtil.notNil(migratedTablesString)){
	migratedTables = migratedTablesString.split(',');
}

var taskExtensions = GlideDBObjectManager.get().getAllExtensions("task");

/*Loop through each table that extends task */
for (var i=0; i<taskExtensions.size(); i++) {
	var table = taskExtensions.get(i).trim()+"";
	var propertyName = "com.snc.skills_management."+table+"_migrate_skills";
	
	var tableRecord = new GlideRecord(table);
	tableRecord.query();
	var scopedPropertyName = tableRecord.getTableScope() + "." +propertyName;
	
	/*If the system property is part of a scoped app, append the scope name to the property*/
	if(tableRecord.getTableScope() != "global" && gs.getProperty(scopedPropertyName)){
		  propertyName = scopedPropertyName;
	}
	
	/*If the migration has not yet happened for a table and it's respective property is set to true, then migrate*/
	if((migratedTables.indexOf(table)== -1) && gs.getProperty(propertyName) == "true"){
		while(tableRecord.next()){
			var skillsArr = []; 
			var taskRecordSysId = tableRecord.getValue("sys_id");
			if(tableRecord.skills)
				skillsArr = tableRecord.skills.split(',');

			for(var j=0; j<skillsArr.length; j++){
				try{
					var taskSkillRecord = new GlideRecord('task_m2m_skill');
					taskSkillRecord.initialize(); 
					taskSkillRecord.setValue("skill",skillsArr[j]);
					taskSkillRecord.setValue("task", taskRecordSysId);
					var taskInsert = taskSkillRecord.insert();
				} catch(error){
					gs.log("TASK SKILL MIGRATION ERROR " + error);
				}
			}
		} 
	migratedTables.push(table);				
	}
}
gs.setProperty("com.snc.skills_management.task_skill_migrated_tables",migratedTables.join());]]></script>
